text: Jamaica competed at the 1994 Winter Olympics in Lillehammer, Norway. Six years after their famous first appearance at the Winter Olympics, the Jamaican four sled stunned many of their critics by finishing in 14th place, ahead of the United States, Russia, France and one sled from Italy.1994 Olympic Men's Bobsled Fours Results * Chris Stokes (four-man pusher) * Dudley Stokes (four- man pilot, two-man pilot) * Wayne Thomas (four-man brakeman, two-man brakeman) * Winston Watts (four-man pusher) ==Bobsleigh== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%; text-align:center;" |- !rowspan="2"| Sled !rowspan="2"| Athletes !rowspan="2"| Event !colspan="2"| Run 1 !colspan="2"| Run 2 !colspan="2"| Run 3 !colspan="2"| Run 4 !colspan="2"| Total |- !
